name: The Stringless

refinement_effect.refine_one: Increases Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by 24%.
refinement_effect.refine_two: Increases Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by 30%.
refinement_effect.refine_three: Increases Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by 36%.
refinement_effect.refine_four: Increases Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by 42%.
refinement_effect.refine_five: Increases Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by 48%.

description: A bow that once served as an extraordinary instrument. It is no longer capable of getting people up and dancing.
